short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Save web pages as self-extracting HTML/ZIP polyglot files
short.de: Speichern von Webseiten als selbstentpackende HTML/ZIP-Hybriddateien
short.es: Guarda páginas web como archivos híbridos HTML/ZIP auto-extraíbles
short.fr: Sauvegardez vos pages web sous forme de fichier polyglote HTML/ZIP
short.it: Salva una pagina completa in un singolo file HTML
short.ja: Web ページを自己解凍型の HTML / ZIP ハイブリッドファイルとして保存する
short.pl: Zapisuj strony internetowe jako samorozpakowujące się hybrydowe pliki HTML/ZIP.
short.pt_BR: Salvar páginas da Web como arquivos poliglotas HTML/ZIP de extração automática
short.pt_PT: Guardar páginas Web como ficheiros poliglotas HTML/ZIP de extração automática
short.ru: охранение веб-страниц в виде самораспаковывающихся гибридных файлов HTML/ZIP
short.tr: Web sayfalarını kendinden çıkartılabilen HTML/ZIP çok dilli dosya olarak kaydet
short.uk: Зберегти всю сторінку в один HTML-файл
short.zh_CN: 将页面保存到自解压式 HTML/ZIP 混合文件中
short.zh_TW: 將頁面保存到自解壓式 HTML/ZIP 混合文件中

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
SingleFileZ is a fork of SingleFile (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/singlefile/mpiodijhokgodhhofbcjdecpffjipkle) that allows you to save a webpage as a self-extracting HTML file. This HTML file is also a valid ZIP file containing all the page resources.

1) Getting started
- Wait until the page is fully loaded.
- Click on the SingleFileZ button in the extension toolbar to save the page.

2) More info
See the extension help in options page for more detailed information about the options, technical notes and known issues.

Project on GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFileZ

3) Troubleshooting unknown issues
Please follow these steps if you find an unknown issue:
- Reset SingleFileZ options.
- If resetting options did not fix the issue, restart the browser.
- If restarting the browser did not fix the issue, try to disable all other extensions to see if there is a conflict.
- If there is a conflict then try to determine against which extension(s).
- Please report the issue with a short description on how to reproduce it here: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/issues..
long.de,fr,ja,pl,ru,zh_CN,zh_TW:
SingleFileZ is a fork of SingleFile (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/singlefile/mpiodijhokgodhhofbcjdecpffjipkle) that allows you to save a webpage into a self-extracting HTML file. This HTML file is also a valid ZIP file containing all the page resources.

To open saved pages from the filesystem in Chrome, SingleFileZ must be installed or Chrome must be started with the switch `--allow-file-access-from-files`.
long.es,uk:
SingleFileZ is a fork of SingleFile (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/singlefile/mpiodijhokgodhhofbcjdecpffjipkle) that allows you to save a webpage as a self-extracting HTML file. This HTML file is also a valid ZIP file containing all the page resources.

IMPORTANT:
To open saved pages from the filesystem in Chrome, SingleFileZ must be already installed and the option "Allow access to file URLs" must be enabled in the details page of the extension (chrome://extensions/?id=offkdfbbigofcgdokjemgjpdockaafjg). Otherwise, Chrome must be started with the switch '--allow-file-access-from-files'.

More info here: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFileZ
long.it,pt_BR,pt_PT,tr:
SingleFileZ is a fork of SingleFile (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/singlefile/mpiodijhokgodhhofbcjdecpffjipkle) that allows you to save a webpage as a self-extracting HTML file. This HTML file is also a valid ZIP file containing all the page resources.

IMPORTANT:
To open saved pages from the filesystem in Chrome, SingleFileZ must be already installed and the option "Allow access to file URLs" must be enabled in the details page of the extension (chrome://extensions/?id=offkdfbbigofcgdokjemgjpdockaafjg). Otherwise, Chrome must be started with the switch '--allow-file-access-from-files'.

1) Getting started
- Wait until the page is fully loaded.
- Click on the SingleFileZ button in the extension toolbar to save the page.

2) More info
See the extension help in options page for more detailed information about the options, technical notes and known issues.

Project on GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFileZ

3) Troubleshooting unknown issues
Please follow these steps if you find an unknown issue:
- Reset SingleFileZ options.
- If resetting options did not fix the issue, restart the browser.
- If restarting the browser did not fix the issue, try to disable all other extensions to see if there is a conflict.
- If there is a conflict then try to determine against which extension(s).
- Please report the issue with a short description on how to reproduce it here: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/issues..
